objects.text:
• Sleek Digital Control Panel
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Large Capacity Drum

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Clothes Dryer - Modern Home Essential
product_details.description:
• Sleek White Design with Modern Digital Display and LED Time Indicator
• Multiple Drying Cycles: Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicate, and More
• User-Friendly Control Panel with Easy-to-Use Selection Dial
• Large Capacity Drum with Generous Loading Door
• Digital Time and Temperature Controls for Precise Drying
• Energy-Efficient Operation to Help Reduce Utility Bills
• Wrinkle Prevention Option Available
• Built-in Maintenance Reminder System
• Convenient Front-Loading Design
• Stackable Design to Save Space (when paired with compatible washer)
• Multiple Temperature Settings for Various Fabric Types
• Quick Dry Option for Small Loads
• Modern White Finish that Complements Any Laundry Room

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and clean promotional layout for a high-efficiency digital dryer. The background is divided into four quadrants, each in soft shades of blue, creating visual segmentation and depth. A central diagonal cross pattern adds structural sophistication. The left half features multiple text elements with varying hierarchy, starting from a bold brand name (`brand_name`), followed by the primary product title (`heading_1`, `heading_2`), and a clear descriptive line (`subheading`). A promotional tagline (`tagline`) appears in a stylized modern font below. The feature highlights (`features`) are presented in a bullet format. The pricing (`price`) stands out in bold white on a blue background. A call-to-action button (`cta_button_bg`, `cta`) completes the layout, urging action. On the right, the product image (`product_image`) takes prominent space, balancing the text-heavy left section.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #2D4B80
- Medium Blue: #4370B2
- Light Blue: #E0E8F5
- Sky Blue: #D3E2F7
- Powder Blue: #BFCEE6
- Steel Blue: #A0BBE0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern electric dryer with a clean, minimalistic aesthetic. The primary color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), used across the body for a sleek and fresh appeal. The black (#000000) circular door and control panel add sharp contrast, drawing attention to key functional areas. A glossy dark grey (#2E2E2E) is used to subtly detail the inner ring of the door, blending smoothly with the black for a polished transition. Accents of cobalt blue (#007BFF), signal red (#FF3B30), and soft gray (#D3D3D3) highlight control options, enhancing usability while adding vibrancy. These colors work harmoniously, blending modernity with functionality.
